casebody.data:
Duane M. HUFFER and Angela Doss, Plaintiffs-Appellants,
v.
FARMERS MUTUAL HAIL INSURANCE COMPANY OF IOWA, Lawnview Farm Trust, Robert Huffer, and Thelma Huffer, individually and as trustee of the Lawnview Trust, Defendants-Appellees. No. 17-0640 Court of Appeals of Iowa. Filed December 20, 2017

DECISION WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINION

Affirmed.
